item.title: Metallb Loadbalancer
item.description: MetalLB hooks into your Kubernetes cluster, and provides a network load-balancer implementation. In short, it allows you to create Kubernetes services of type LoadBalancer in clusters that don’t run on a cloud provider, and thus cannot simply hook into paid products to provide load balancers. This example has been tested on a Ubuntu 1.27 Cluster running on a VMWare ESX host. The IP range 192.168.0.230->192.168.0.240 is available on the local network for use.
